align.description: Controls align-items CSS property, 'stretch' by default
align.description_zh: 控制 align-items CSS 属性，默认为 'stretch'

gap.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set gap property, numbers are converted to rem, 'md' by default
gap.description_zh: key的 theme.spacing 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 gap 属性，数字默认转换为 rem，'md'

justify.description: Controls justify-content CSS property, 'flex-start' by default
justify.description_zh: 控制 justify-content CSS 属性，默认为 'flex-start'
